00040 
00041 void OSMRelation::addMember( QXmlStreamReader &xml )
00042 {
00043   OSMRelationMember::Type type;
00044   if( xml.attributes().value( "type" ) == "way" )
00045     type = OSMRelationMember::Way;
00046   else
00047     type = OSMRelationMember::Node;
00048   
00049   addMember( OSMRelationMember( type, xml.attributes().value( "ref" ).toString().toInt() ) );
00050 }

00054   return m_members;

00067 OSMNode* OSMRelation::getMemberNode( OSMRelationMember member )
00068 {
00069   if( member.type() == OSMRelationMember::Node )
00070     return m_parent->getNodePtrById( member.ref() );
00071   else
00072     return 0;
00073 }
00074

00076 {
00077   return getMemberNode( m_members.at( i ) );
00078 }

00080 OSMWay* OSMRelation::getMemberWay( OSMRelationMember member )
00081 {
00082   if( member.type() == OSMRelationMember::Way )
00083     return m_parent->getWayPtrById( member.ref() );
00084   else
00085     return 0;
00086 }
